message:
SYSTEM: OWL.pdf: Página 20
Web Ontology Language
OWL semantics
Pedro has spanish nationality 
¿Does Pedro have british nationality?
CWA (DB): No 
OWA (OWL KB): We don't know (Pedro can have double 
nationality). Till we assert that Pedro can only have one 
nationality, OWL will assume he can have more than one
OWA advantage: we can add new knowledge (e.g. New 
nationalities) easily, we don't have to “change the schema”
OWA is good for settings in which our knowledge will always be 
incomplete: open systems like the (Semantic) Web
speaker: SYSTEM
